categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Mathiren was a Sith pureblood male who was a Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic.
Mathiren was first introduced as a Flashpoint Vendor in Game Update 2.7 for Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel.
